transcript.text: I'm a zombie this sickness won't leave me alone
But we don't give a fuck because today, my friends, we will live a new love story.
Yes, you remember, a few years ago we played at Emily Is Away
It was a simulator of MSN were you talked to a girl called Emily
and *huh* years after years you saw the relationship building up between you and this girl
and it was really frustrating because it was clearly the woman of your life !
But you couldn't get her.. *ohhhh*
*shhh* Don't be sad don't be sad !
The 2 just came out.
Maybe this time he will manage to go out with the woman of his life !
*claps*
This is what we hope for
Okey first chapter !
Summer 2006
*reading and translating*
We're starting with a bit of emotion !
It-it makes a little bit emotional !
I notice it's still the same crappy chat as before, huh, they didn't move on to Facebook or something
Our name's gonna be Philippe
Girls love boys called Philippe
*french accent* "First name" ?
It will be *huuhhh* Philippos
Girls love boys called Philippos
We're building up our profile.
Are we more Chamillionaire or *horrible french accent* Arctic Monkeys.. or Against me ?
Obviously *still horrible french accent* Artic Monkeys !
Okey let's goooo !
"Yoooooo Philippos !"
HEY
First Philippos is for my closest friends, you call me Philippe pls
K ?
People are too confident
"yoooo evelyn !"
K, who's Evelyn ?
"just chillinn, about to paint my nails. I cant decide what color though"
Wait wait wait, cause if it's not Emily, WE DON'T GIVE A FUCK ! We just want to talk to Emily !
"black", "cyan" or "I believe in you" ?
"I believe in you" obviously !
She will feel supported and we'll score a few points !
So, if you're interested in a girl, NEVER do what I say in my videos, it's the worst you can do !
"ughh, but its such a struggle ! speaking of colors, I like your new scheme!"
Yeah it took me a lot of time
Dunno know what she's talking about
"so hows your summer doing?"
Good, it's alright, good !
Y'know you musn't say it was boring or fun either.
We-we stay in the neutral part of the answer, y'see.
Once again never follow this advice
"that's swell! what have you been up to?"
"video games" ?
I hanged out with my friends
or I did some romance..
*huhhhhhh*
I hanged out with my friends, it's pretty gooood
We're a young normal guy, we're classic
"oh coolcoool. I cant believe we go back to school in a month D:"
*ridiculous voice* school sucks
yeah, school's cool
ohh I'm looking forward to it
We're gonna say school's okay.
Nah but here we're *high pitched voice* NEUTRAL, we're NEUTRAL !
*back to normal* but suddenly, we're going to separate buddy
Like in the Suricate's movie and you'll see they're gonna be shocked
"yeah it can be, like our history class last year"
False alarm ! Shit I translated it the wrong way
"like our HISTORY CLASS last year"
*laugh*
Fuck I'm so into it I'm starting to see love where there isn't any at all
I say yeah this class was cool
But I'm only doing closed answers, I'm only agreeing with what she's saying, it's kinda shit.
I'm kinda shit.
I may stop hitting on women for the rest of my life
"you still have to hang out with me and my friends some time"
Definitely ! Definitely !! We're answering DEFINITELY
"got any big plans for the rest of the summer?"
Let's say "more hanging out".
Like this we're making an opening big like this buddy.
And we want her to enter and say "come come with me, no prob !"
What I'm saying is awesome
"me and my friends are driving up to warped tour on saturday"
"it's a punk rock music festival!"
"what's your favorite kind of music ?"
*wink*
"punk rock" ! Just like you !
"yooo! you're my new best friend !"
Does anyone has a rope ?
Actually I don't think we're talking to the girl we want to fuck
*snif*
Let me comfort myself by saying this T-T
"man idk where my friends are, they were supposed to pick me up like half an hour ago"
Have you seen this door opening right now ?
Every thing is under controll, just TRUST IN ME !
They're probably dead
I love irony, it makes me laugh a lot
the problem is that if she doesn't, we're dead !
"lol youre probably right, were supposed to go to my friends house and partyy"
And leave me alone like this ?
Yeah but if I say that I'm kinda a glue-pot, maybe she will suggests me to come ! But maybe she will tell us to stick along !
"don't you worry, I got my phone"
*breaks into tears T-T*
This video is a continuous stab in my heart !
"I should probably start getting some stuff together"
Honestly, you can put me into your stuff quickly
No one will see
We're just gonna say : "are you not coming back tonight?"
"idk I might stay over jackies, well see"
"ohh I should bring a movie, wanna help me pick?"
Nah, dude, I'm done, it's not even the friendzone anymore dude !
it's the friendship army !

but to chose the movie in front of which she is going to excite her boyfriend, NO PROBLEM !
